messages.subject: Testing---the mandatory kind
messages.msgSnippet: My kids have to be tested this year I am so NONtest that I am not even sure of the name of the tests In PA you have to be tested in certain grades....I was
messages.messageBody:
My kids have to be tested this year
I am so NONtest that I am not even sure of the name of the tests
In PA you have to be tested in certain grades....I was wondering if anyone knew where I could get samples of the kinds and types of tests they give in school.
My advisor informed me that they may not know how to take a test and of course I did not even think of that aspect of it and when I voiced my concerns to the principal of the elementary school she did not seem to want to be bothered
I hid my daughter "away" in the third grade--she is now in "5th" and my son in "3rd" and I have no experience with these tests AT all---but I am told that they are easy
I do not do much (if any) formal schooling---So I need to find out what types of things they will be asked.
When I teach them--I teach them through LIFE and I am so sure that is not what these happy little tests are going to ask--they want them to memorize their little theorems etc...Geez
Does anyone have any resources or know where to look?
Thanks in advance
SOS
